timeline.message:
Update docker compose configuration

Add an environment variable required by PostgreSQL docker image.

timeline.bodyText:
🤔 would it make sense to leverage secrets here to encode/protect the password? https://docs.docker.com/engine/swarm/secrets/#build-support-for-docker-secrets-into-your-images
Or will this always be used for demo purposes so it isn't considered a secret?
timeline.author: ChristianMurphy
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -49,6 +49,8 @@ services:
     restart: always
     networks:
       - oeq-cluster
+    environment:
+      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD="${POSTGRES_PASSWORD}"

replies.bodyText: I thought it would be used for development purpose, but I am happy to add Docker secrets.
replies.author: PenghaiZhang

replies.bodyText:
Yeah, probably okay. Really only for dev/demo. I would not advise this for a production setup.
Mind you, I do hope that in the future we can start looking at an official 'docker' offering with images and compose files.
replies.author: edalex-ian
